source: To compare the effect of Sheng-Xue-Xiao-Ban Capsule (SXXBC) and indirubin to the peripheral platelets of the Idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP) model mouse.
target: 比较生血消斑胶囊(SXXBC)和地红素对特发性血小板减少性紫癜(ITP)模型小鼠外周血血小板的影响。

source: The ITP mouse model was established by the method of passive immunization.
target: 采用被动免疫的方法建立ITP小鼠模型。

source: SXXBC and indirubin were used for intervention treatment.
target: 采用SXXBC和Indirubin进行干预治疗。

source: Then the hemorrhagic phenomena of ITP mice were observed and the numbers of peripheral platelets, hemoglobin and white blood cells, bone marrow megakaryocytes and their classification and coagulation function were detected and compared.
target: 然后观察ITP小鼠的出血现象，检测并比较其外周血血小板、血红蛋白和白细胞、骨髓巨核细胞的数量及其分类和凝血功能。

source: The improvement rate of hemorrhage in SXXBC group was 40% for small dose, 60% for medium dose and 80% for high dose, while the improvement rate of hemorrhage in indirubin group was 30% for small dose, 50% for medium dose and 60% for high dose.
target: SXXBC组出血改善率小剂量为40%，中剂量为60%，高剂量为80%，而靛玉红组出血改善率小剂量为30%，中剂量为50%，高剂量为60%。

source: There was no statistically significant difference in the improvement rate of hemorrhage between the two groups (P＞0.05).
target: 两组出血改善率比较，差异无统计学意义(P>0.05)。

source: Compared with the model control group, PLT and Hb increased in different doses of SXXBC and indirubin group 4th-8th day after drug intervention (P＜0.05, 0.01).
target: 与模型对照组比较，药物干预后4~8天，不同剂量的SXXBC和靛玉红组PLT和Hb均升高(P<0.05，0.01)。

source: However, there was no significant difference between the different doses of SXXBC group and indirubin group (P＞0.05).
target: 而不同剂量的SXXBC组与靛玉红组比较差异无统计学意义(P>0.05)。

source: Compared with the model control group, the WBC in each group was significantly lower (P＜0.05, 0.01) on the 4th-8th day after drug intervention; However, there was no statistical significance between the two groups of SXXBC and indirubin (P＞0.05).
target: 与模型对照组比较，药物干预后第4~8天，各组WBC均显着降低(P<0.05，0.01)；但SXXBC和靛蓝两组比较，差异无统计学意义(P>0.05)。

source: Compared with the model control group, the total number of megakaryocytes in each treatment group were decreased (P＜0.05, P＜0.01), in which the number of primary megakaryocytes in the large and medium dose groups of SXXBC and indirubin were decreased (P＜0.05, 0.01), and the number of juvenile megakaryocytes in the large dose group of SXXBC and indirubin were also decreased (P＜0.05).
target: 与模型对照组比较，各治疗组巨核细胞总数均减少(P<0.05，P<0.01)，其中SXXBC和靛玉红大、中剂量组原代巨核细胞数减少(P<0.05，0.01)，SXXBC和靛蓝大剂量组巨核细胞幼数和巨核细胞幼数也减少(P<0.05)。

source: The number of granular megakaryocytes were decreased in each intervention groups (P＜0.05, 0.01), and the number of thromocytogenic megakaryocyte was increased in the high and medium dose groups of SXXBC and indirubin (P＜0.01).
target: 各干预组颗粒状巨核细胞数量均减少(P<0.05，0.01)，SXXBC和靛玉红高、中剂量组致血栓性巨核细胞数量增加(P<0.01)。

source: The time of prothrombin was shortened in the high and medium dose groups of SXXBC and indirubin (P＜0.05), and the fibrinogen (FIB) content in the high and medium dose groups of SXXBC was close to that of the normal control group.
target: SXXBC和靛玉红高、中剂量组凝血酶原时间缩短(P<0.05)，SXXBC高、中剂量组纤维蛋白原(FIB)含量与正常对照组接近。

source: Both of the SXXBC and the indirubin standard all show good hemostatic effects.
target: SXXBC和靛玉红标准品均表现出良好的止血效果。

source: Indirubin shows a positive effect on increasing the peripheral platelet and hemoglobin in ITP model mice, regulating the immune response, reducing the total number of bone marrow megakaryocytes, increasing the thromocytogenic megakaryocyte, and increasing coagulation function.
target: 靛红有增加ITP模型小鼠外周血血小板和血红蛋白，调节免疫应答，减少骨髓巨核细胞总数，增加致血栓性巨核细胞，提高凝血功能的积极作用。

source: A simplified grading system for trachoma was published by the World Health Organization (WHO) in 1987.
target: 世界卫生组织(WHO)于1987年公布了沙眼的简化分级系统。

source: Intended for use by non-specialist personnel working at community level, the system includes five signs, each of which can be present or absent in any eye: (i) trachomatous trichiasis; (ii) corneal opacity; (iii) trachomatous inflammation-follicular; (iv) trachomatous inflammation-intense; and (v) trachomatous scarring.
target: 该系统打算供在社区一级工作的非专业人员使用，包括五种体征，每一种体征在任何眼睛中都可以存在或不存在：(i)沙眼性倒置；(ii)角膜混浊；(iii)沙眼性炎症-滤泡；(iv)沙眼性炎症-强烈；(v)沙眼性瘢痕。

source: Though neither perfectly sensitive nor perfectly specific for trachoma, these signs have been essential tools for identifying populations that need interventions to eliminate trachoma as a public health problem.
target: 尽管这些体征对沙眼既不完全敏感，也不完全特异，但已成为确定需要干预以消除沙眼这一公共卫生问题的人群的重要工具。

source: In 2018, at WHO's 4th global scientific meeting on trachoma, the definition of one of the signs, trachomatous trichiasis, was amended to exclude trichiasis that affects only the lower eyelid.
target: 2018年，在世卫组织关于沙眼的第四次全球科学会议上，修正了沙眼体征之一的定义，即沙眼性倒毛，排除了仅累及下眼睑的倒毛。

source: This paper presents the amended system, updates its presentation, offers notes on its use and identifies areas of ongoing debate.
target: 本文介绍了经修订的系统，更新了其介绍，提供了关于其使用的说明，并确定了正在辩论的领域。

source: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
target: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
target: 流感病毒可具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，可导致快速和广泛的传播，导致每年流行，并在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公众聚集场所爆发。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
target: 根据世卫组织的估计，季节性流感流行每年在全球造成300万至5 00万重症病例，29万至65万人死亡。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
target: 孕妇、幼儿、老年人和慢性病患者患与流感病毒感染相关的重症和死亡的风险很高。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
target: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

source: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
target: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
target: 目前，我国已获得许可的三价流感灭活疫苗(IIV3)包括裂解病毒流感疫苗和亚单位疫苗、裂解的四价流感灭活疫苗(IIV4)和新获得许可的三价流感减毒活疫苗(LAIV3)。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
target: 除个别大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，也就是说流感疫苗是自愿接种的，受种者必须自费。

source: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
target: 2018年和2019年，中国疾控中心分别发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。

source: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
target: 在过去的一年里，国内外新的研究证据陆续发表，新型季节性流感疫苗在中国获得了许可。

source: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
target: 为加强我国流感防控技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会(NIAC)流感疫苗接种技术工作组(TWG)对2019-2020年技术指南进行了更新，编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南(2020-2021)》。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
target: 本版更新主要包括以下几个方面：第一，新的研究证据，特别是中国的研究，包括疾病负担、有效性、疫苗可避免的疾病负担、疫苗安全性监测、成本效益和成本效益。

source: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
target: 二是去年国家卫生健康委发布的流感防控政策和措施。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
target: 三是新型季节性流感疫苗于2020-2021年在中国获批上市。

source: Fourth, northern hemisphere influenza vaccination composition for the 2020-2021 season which included trivalent and quadrivalent influenza vaccine.
target: 第四，北半球2020-2021年季节流感疫苗接种组合物，包括三价和四价流感疫苗。

source: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
target: 第五，2020-2021年流感季节的流感疫苗接种建议。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
target: 本报告中描述的建议包括：疫苗接种点诊所(POV)应为所有6个月及以上愿意接种且无禁忌症的人提供流感疫苗接种。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
target: 对于有一种以上许可、推荐和适当产品可用的人，不优先推荐一种流感疫苗产品而不是另一种流感疫苗产品。

target_errors.term: 而不是另一种流感疫苗产品

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
target: 考虑到COVID-19全球大流行的情况，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险并将对COVID-19防控的影响降至最低，我们建议季节性流感疫苗接种的重点如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体和照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在人口密度高的场所工作或居住的人，如幼儿园、中小学校的教师和学生、服刑人员和监狱工作人员；其他流感高危人群，包括≥60岁的成年人、6-59个月的儿童、患有特定慢性疾病的人、<6个月婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇或计划在流感季节怀孕的妇女。

source: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
target: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要在第一个接种季节至少间隔4周接种2剂流感疫苗，以达到最佳保护效果。

source: People whoever get IIV or LAIV all apply to the principle.
target: 得到IIV或LAIV的人都适用这个原则。

source: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
target: 如果他们在2019-2020年流感季节或之前的流感季节接种过疫苗，建议接种1剂。

source: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
target: 8岁以上的人需要接种1剂流感疫苗。

source: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
target: 建议人们在10月底之前接种流感疫苗。

source: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
target: 一旦有了流感疫苗，就应提供流感疫苗接种。

source: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
target: 对于无法在10月底前接种流感疫苗的人，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。

source: Influenza vaccine is also recommended for use in pregnant women during any trimester.
target: 流感疫苗也建议孕妇在任何妊娠三个月内使用。

source: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
target: 本指南供各级疾控中心从事流感防控工作的工作人员、POV工作人员、儿科、内科、传染病科医护人员、各级妇幼保健机构工作人员使用。

source: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
target: 随着新证据的出现，这些指南将定期更新。

source: Very high-resolution (VHR) satellite sensors can be used to estimate the size of animal populations, a critical factor in wildlife management, and acquire animal spatial distributions in an economical, easy, and precise way.
target: 非常高分辨率(VHR)卫星传感器可用于估计动物种群的大小，这是野生动物管理中的一个关键因素，并以经济、简单和精确的方式获取动物空间分布。

source: We developed a method for satellite population size estimation that includes a noninvasive photogrammetry, from which the animal's average orthographic area is calculated, and an imagery interpretation method that estimates population size based on the ratio of an observed animal population area to the average individual area.
target: 我们开发了一种用于卫星种群大小估计的方法，该方法包括一种非侵入式摄影测量，从中计算动物的平均正位面积，以及一种图像解释方法，该方法基于观察到的动物种群面积与平均个体面积的比率来估计种群大小。

source: As a proof of concept, we used this method to estimate the population size of Whooper Swans (Cygnus cygnus) in a national nature reserve in China.
target: 作为概念的证明，我们使用该方法估计了中国一个国家级自然保护区内的白天鹅(Cygnus cygnus)的种群规模。

source: To reduce errors, the reserve was subdivided into regions of interest based on locations of Whooper Swan and background brightness.
target: 为了减少误差，根据Whooper Swan的位置和背景亮度将保留区细分为感兴趣区域。

source: Estimates from the satellite pixels were compared with manual counts made over 2 years, at 3 locations, and in 3 land-cover types.
target: 将卫星像素估计值与2年来在3个地点和3个陆地覆盖类型进行的手动计数进行了比较。

source: Our results showed 1124 Whooper Swans occupied a national nature reserve on 15 February 2013, and the average percent error was 3.16% (SE = 1.37).
target: 我们的结果显示，2013年2月15日，1124只Whooper Swans占据了一个国家级自然保护区，平均百分比误差为3.16%(SE = 1.37)。

source: These results demonstrate that our method produced robust data for population size estimation that were indistinguishable from manual count data.
target: 这些结果表明，我们的方法产生了用于人口规模估计的稳健数据，这些数据与手工计数数据无法区分。

source: Our method may be used generally to estimate population sizes of visible and gregarious animals that exhibit high contrast relative to their environments and may inform estimations of populations in complex backgrounds.
target: 我们的方法一般可用于估计相对于其环境表现出高对比度的可见动物和合群动物的种群规模，并可为复杂背景下种群的估计提供信息。

source: Kenya's Constitution of 2010 triggered a cascade of reforms across all sectors to align with new constitutional standards, including devolution and a comprehensive bill of rights.
target: 2010年《肯尼亚宪法》引发了所有部门的一连串改革，以符合新的宪法标准，包括权力下放和一项全面的权利法案。

source: The constitution acts as a platform to advance health rights and to restructure policy, legal, institutional and regulatory frameworks towards reversing chronic gaps and improving health outcomes.
target: 《宪法》作为一个平台，促进健康权，重组政策、法律、体制和监管框架，以扭转长期差距，改善卫生成果。

source: These constitutionally mandated health reforms are complex.
target: 这些宪法授权的卫生改革是复杂的。

source: All parts of the health system are transforming concurrently, with several new laws enacted and public health bodies established.
target: 同时，卫生系统的所有部分都在转型，颁布了几项新法律，并建立了公共卫生机构。

source: Implementing such complex change was hampered by inadequate tools and approaches.
target: 实施这种复杂的变革因工具和方法不足而受到阻碍。

source: To gain a picture of the extent of the health reforms over the first 10 years of the constitution, we developed an adapted health-system framework, guided by World Health Organization concepts and definitions.
target: 为了了解《宪法》头10年卫生改革的程度，我们在世界卫生组织的概念和定义指导下，制定了经调整的卫生系统框架。

source: We applied the framework to document the health laws and public bodies already enacted and currently in progress, and compared the extent of transformation before and after the 2010 Constitution.
target: 我们应用该框架来记录已经颁布和目前正在实施的卫生法和公共机构，并比较了2010年宪法颁布前后的转变程度。

source: Our analysis revealed multiple structures (laws and implementing public bodies) formed across the health system, with many new stewardship structures aligned to devolution, but with fragmentation within the regulation sub-function.
target: 我们的分析显示，在整个卫生系统中形成了多种结构(法律和实施公共机构)，许多新的管理结构与权力下放保持一致，但在监管子职能内存在碎片化。

source: By deconstructing normative health-system functions, the framework enabled an all-inclusive mapping of various health-system attributes (functions, laws and implementing bodies).
target: 通过解构规范的卫生系统功能，该框架能够对卫生系统的各种属性(功能、法律和执行机构)进行包罗万象的映射。

source: We believe our framework is a useful tool for countries who wish to develop and implement a conducive legal foundation for universal health coverage.
target: 我们认为，我们的框架对于那些希望制定和实施全民医保有利法律基础的国家来说是一个有用的工具。

source: Constitutional reform is a mobilizing force for large leaps in health institutional change, boosting two aspects of feasibility for change: stakeholder acceptance and authority to proceed.
target: 宪法改革是保健体制变革大跃进的动员力量，提高了变革可行性的两个方面：利益攸关方的接受程度和进行改革的权威。

source: Idiopathic intracranial hypertension (IIH) is characterised by raised intracranial pressure (ICP) and papilloedema in the absence of an identifiable secondary cause typically occurring in young women with obesity.
target: 特发性颅内高压(IIH)的特点是颅内压(ICP)升高和乳头水肿，缺乏可识别的次要原因，典型发生于肥胖的年轻女性。

source: The impact is considerable with the potential for blindness, chronic disabling headaches, future risk of cardiovascular disease and marked healthcare utilisation.
target: 这种影响是相当大的，有可能导致失明、慢性致残性头痛、未来患心血管疾病的风险以及显着的医疗保健利用率。

source: There have been marked advances in our understanding the pathophysiology of IIH including the role of androgen excess.
target: 我们对IIH病理生理学的认识有了显着进展，包括雄激素过量的作用。

source: Insight into pathophysiological underpinnings has arisen from astute clinical observations, studies, and an array of preclinical models.
target: 对病理生理学基础的洞察源于敏锐的临床观察、研究和一系列临床前模型。

source: This article summarises the current literature pertaining to the pathophysiology of IIH.
target: 本文综述了目前有关IIH病理生理学的文献。

source: The current preclinical models relevant to gaining mechanistic insights into IIH are then discussed.
target: 然后讨论了当前与获得IIH的力学见解相关的临床前模型。

source: In vitro and in vivo models which study CSF secretion and the effect of potentially pathogenic molecules have started to glean important mechanistic insights.
target: 研究脑脊液分泌和潜在致病分子作用的体外和体内模型已经开始收集重要的机制见解。

source: These models are also useful to evaluate novel therapeutic targets to abrogate CSF secretion.
target: 这些模型也可用于评价消除脑脊液分泌的新治疗靶点。

source: Importantly, in vitro CSF secretion assays translate into relevant changes in ICP in vivo.
target: 重要的是，体外脑脊液分泌测定转化为体内ICP的相关变化。

source: Models of CSF absorption pertinent to IIH, are less well established but highly relevant and of future interest.
target: 与IIH相关的脑脊液吸收模型尚未完全建立，但高度相关，具有未来意义。

source: There is no fully developed in vivo model of IIH but this remains an area of importance.
target: 目前还没有完全开发的IIH体内模型，但这仍然是一个重要领域。

source: Progress is being made to improve our understanding of the underlying aetiology in IIH including the characterisation of disease biomarkers and their mechanistic role in driving disease pathology.
target: 在提高我们对IIH基础病因学的理解方面正在取得进展，包括疾病生物标志物的特征及其在驱动疾病病理学中的机制作用。

source: Preclinical models, used to evaluate IIH mechanisms are yielding important mechanistic insights.
target: 用于评估IIH机制的临床前模型正在产生重要的机制见解。

source: Further work to refine these techniques will provide translatable insights into disease aetiology.
target: 进一步完善这些技术的工作将为疾病病因学提供可翻译的见解。

source: To review the research progress of adrenergic β-antagonists on wounds and diabetic chronic cutaneous ulcers healing in recent years, and to investigate its application prospect in diabetic foot ulcer (DFU).
target: 综述近年来肾上腺素能β受体拮抗剂对创面及糖尿病慢性皮肤溃疡愈合的研究进展，探讨其在糖尿病足溃疡(DFU)中的应用前景。

source: The latest literature about the role of adrenergic β-antagonists in wounds and diabetic chronic cutaneous ulcers healing was extensively reviewed, and the mechanisms of adrenergic β-antagonists for wounds and its potential benefit for DFU were analyzed thoroughly.
target: 广泛综述了有关肾上腺素能β-拮抗剂在创面和糖尿病慢性皮肤溃疡愈合中作用的最新文献，全面分析了肾上腺素能β-拮抗剂用于创面的机制及其对DFU的潜在益处。

source: The adrenergic β-antagonists can accelerate the wound healing.
target: 肾上腺素能β受体阻滞剂可加速创面愈合。

source: The possible mechanisms include accelerating re-epithelialization, promoting angiogenesis, improving neuropathy, and regulating inflammation and growth factors,  Adrenergic β-antagonists maybe promote the healing of wounds and diabetic chronic cutaneous ulcers.
target: 可能的机制包括加速再上皮化、促进血管新生、改善神经病变、调节炎症和生长因子、肾上腺素能β受体拮抗剂可能促进创面愈合和糖尿病慢性皮肤溃疡。

source: However, more long-term follow-up and high-quality randomized control studies are needed to further verify their efficacy and safety for DFU.
target: 然而，还需要更多的长期随访和高质量的随机对照研究来进一步验证其治疗DFU的有效性和安全性。

source: COVID-19 is a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC).
target: COVID-19是国际关注的突发公共卫生事件(PHEIC)。

source: Direct economic loss is expected to be much more than that of SARS outbreak in 2003.
target: 预计直接经济损失将远大于2003年SARS爆发造成的损失。

source: The risk factors of COVID-19 epidemic at the early stage included the misjudgment of the epidemic, delay in reporting this emerging infectious disease, nosocomial infection-caused transmission of the virus into local communities, and weak public health interventions.
target: COVID-19疫情在早期阶段的风险因素包括对疫情的错误判断、对这种新出现的传染病的延迟报告、医院感染导致的病毒向当地社区的传播以及公共卫生干预措施薄弱。

source: The infection rate (or the incidence) reflects the prophylactic effect in population.
target: 感染率(或发病率)反映人群中的预防效果。

source: Case fatality reflects the therapeutic effect of clinical intervention.
target: 病死率反映了临床干预的治疗效果。

source: There were sufficient medical resources at the national top levels accumulated in Wuhan.
target: 武汉积累了充足的国家顶级医疗资源。

source: Furthermore, medical professionals and sufficient medical supplies from other provinces have been assigned to join in the fighting against the epidemic in Wuhan.
target: 此外，还从外省抽调了医疗专业人员和充足的医疗物资，投入到武汉的抗疫一线。

source: However, the case fatality in Wuhan has been kept the highest in China, indicating that clinical treatment for this virus-caused emerging infectious disease, whose pathogenesis remains to be elucidated, with limited effect in controlling this epidemic.
target: 然而，武汉的病死率一直保持在全国最高，这表明对这种由病毒引起的新发传染病的临床治疗，其发病机制仍有待阐明，对控制这一流行病的效果有限。

target_errors.term: 其发病机制仍有待阐明

source: The unusual, extremely costly public health interventions including the temporarily city quarantine and transportation ban issued by the central government are crucial in controlling this epidemic.
target: 不同寻常的、费用极高的公共卫生干预措施，包括中央政府发布的临时城市隔离和交通禁令，对控制这一流行病至关重要。

source: The control of epidemic indicates the importance of public health measures but also reflected its insufficient capacity in China.
target: 疫情的控制表明了公共卫生措施的重要性，但也反映了中国公共卫生措施的能力不足。

source: Recently, profit-seeking mechanism run in Chinese health service system disorganized the balance of clinical service and public health service patterns in China, promoting the vicious circle of "attaching importance to clinical treatment and despising disease prophylaxis" , damaging the infrastructure of public health capacity, thus contributing to the formation of the inevitability in various fortuities of public health emergency.
target: 近年来，我国卫生服务体系中运行的逐利机制打乱了我国临床服务与公共卫生服务模式的平衡，促进了“重视临床治疗而轻视疾病预防”的恶性循环，破坏了公共卫生能力的基础设施，从而促成了公共卫生突发事件在各种偶然性中的必然性形成。

source: To strength the capacity of our medical service system to respond to public health emergency efficiently, two key issues should be considered.
target: 加强我国医疗服务体系高效应对突发公共卫生事件的能力，应考虑两个关键问题。

source: First, public health service, which should be fixed as the health section of the governments' public services by the law, must be greatly improved to meet the increasing health needs of the publics.
target: 首先，公共卫生服务必须得到极大的改善，以满足公众日益增长的健康需求，公共卫生服务应被法律固定为政府公共服务中的卫生部分。

source: Second, the vicious circle of profit-seeking-caused "attaching importance to clinical treatment and despising disease prophylaxis" should be immediately broken to optimize the national health service system in China by increasing the investment in public health service.
target: 二是要立即打破逐利导致的“重视临床、轻视疾病预防”的恶性循环，通过加大对公共卫生服务的投入，优化我国国民健康服务体系。

source: To explore whether unicompartmental knee arthroplasty (UKA) and total knee arthroplasty (TKA) or bilateral TKAs should be performed in patients with bilateral knee osteoarthritis.
target: 探讨双侧膝关节骨性关节炎患者是否应行单侧膝关节置换术(UKA)、全膝关节置换术(TKA)或双侧TKA。

source: Between April 2015 and February 2017, 24 patients with bilateral knee osteoarthritis who met the selection criteria were included in the study and randomly divided into 2 groups (  The incisions in both groups were healed by first intention after two stage operations. The differences in the operation time, the amount of postoperative drainage, and the time of active flexion of the knee joint at 90° between the two groups were not significant in the first-stage operation (  On the premise of strict indications, the patients with bilateral knee osteoarthritis should be treated according to their own pathological changes in order to obtain better short-term effectiveness.
target: 在2015年4月至2017年2月期间，24例符合入选标准的双侧膝关节骨性关节炎患者纳入研究，并随机分为2组(2组患者经过2个阶段的手术后切口均以第一意向愈合)。一期手术两组手术时间、术后引流量、膝关节90°主动屈曲时间差异无统计学意义(在严格适应证的前提下，双侧膝关节骨性关节炎患者应根据自身病理改变进行治疗，以获得较好的近期疗效)。

source: To explore experiences of peer support among parents of children with congenital heart defects.
target: 探讨先天性心脏缺陷患儿家长同伴支持的经验。

source: A study analysing written responses to open-ended questions about peer support, collected via an online survey distributed in Sweden.
target: 分析通过在瑞典分发的在线调查收集的关于同伴支持的开放式问题的书面答复的研究。

source: Respondents were recruited during 3 months in 2018 by means of convenience sampling, through ads via the Swedish foundation for families with children who have heart defects and two closed Facebook groups for peer support.
target: 在2018年的3个月内，通过便利抽样的方式，通过瑞典基金会为有心脏缺陷儿童的家庭发布的广告和两个关闭的脸书同伴支持小组，招募了受访者。

source: An online survey containing open-ended questions was distributed and responses were analysed with systematic text condensation.
target: 分发了一份包含开放式问题的在线调查，并对答复进行了系统的文本浓缩分析。

source: Peer support was grounded in a mutual understanding among parents and involved highly appreciated emotional support.
target: 同伴支持建立在父母之间的相互理解的基础上，包括高度赞赏的情感支持。

source: Listening to the stories of peers meant an opportunity to gain useful insights about what life is like for parents of children with heart defects.
target: 听同伴的故事意味着有机会获得关于有心脏缺陷儿童的父母的生活是怎样的有用的见解。

source: Receiving and providing peer support was described as rewarding on a personal level.
target: 接受和提供同伴支持被描述为在个人层面上是有益的。

source: Negative aspects of peer support were also described, which sometimes led to psychological distress and withdrawal from peer support activities.
target: 还描述了同伴支持的消极方面，有时导致心理困扰和退出同伴支持活动。

source: Peer support is emotionally relieving and appreciated among parents of children with congenital heart defects, who consider providing the support a rewarding responsibility.
target: 在患有先天性心脏缺陷的儿童的父母中，同伴支持在情感上是缓解和赞赏的，他们认为提供这种支持是一种有益的责任。

source: While peer support activities may have considerable benefits for individuals, it may also lead to psychological distress for some.
target: 虽然同伴支持活动可能对个人有相当大的好处，但也可能给一些人带来心理困扰。

source: This study addressed peer support among parents of children with congenital heart defects.
target: 本研究探讨了先天性心脏缺陷儿童父母的同伴支持。

source: The main findings illustrate the potential impact peer support can have on individuals and calls attention to the experienced benefits related to peer support activities, while also providing some insights regarding potential negative aspects.
target: 主要研究结果说明了同伴支持可能对个人产生的潜在影响，并提请人们注意与同伴支持活动有关的经验好处，同时也提供了关于潜在消极方面的一些见解。

source: The findings have relevance for nurses, midwives, and other health professionals working in settings providing care for these families.
target: 研究结果与在为这些家庭提供护理的环境中工作的护士、助产士和其他保健专业人员相关。

source: Alleles, genotypes and haplotypes (combinations of alleles) have been widely used in gene-disease association studies.
target: 等位基因、基因型和单倍型(等位基因的组合)已被广泛用于基因-疾病关联研究。

source: More recently, association studies using diplotypes (haplotype pairs on homologous chromosomes) have become increasingly common.
target: 最近，使用二倍型(同源染色体上的单倍型对)的关联研究变得越来越普遍。

source: This article reviews the rationale of the four types of association analyses and discusses the situations in which diplotype-based analyses are more powerful than the other types of association analyses.
target: 本文综述了四种类型关联分析的原理，并讨论了基于二倍型的分析比其他类型的关联分析更强大的情况。

source: Haplotype-based association analyses are more powerful than allele-based association analyses, and diplotype-based association analyses are more powerful than genotype-based analyses.
target: 基于单倍型的关联分析比基于等位基因的关联分析更强大，基于二倍型的关联分析比基于基因型的分析更强大。

source: In circumstances where there are no interaction effects between markers and where the criteria for Hardy-Weinberg Equilibrium (HWE) are met, the larger sample size and smaller degrees of freedom of allele-based and haplotype-based association analyses make them more powerful than genotype-based and diplotype-based association analyses, respectively.
target: 在标记之间不存在相互作用效应且满足Hardy-Weinberg平衡(HWE)标准的情况下，基于等位基因和单倍型的关联分析的较大样本量和较小的自由度使它们分别比基于基因型和基于二倍型的关联分析更强大。

source: However, under certain circumstances diplotype-based analyses are more powerful than haplotype-based analysis.
target: 然而，在某些情况下，基于二倍型的分析比基于单倍型的分析更强大。

source: SCORE-15 (Systemic Clinical Outcome and Routine Evaluation) is a 15-item questionnaire for completion by family members aged 12 years and older to assess outcomes in systemic therapy.
target: SCORE-15(系统临床结果和常规评价)是一份15项的问卷，供12岁及以上的家庭成员完成，以评估系统治疗的结果。

source: This study aimed to investigate (a) the psychometric properties and the internal consistency reliability of the Italian version of SCORE-15, (b) clinical responsiveness, and (c) normative (Italian) criteria.
target: 本研究旨在调查(a)意大利版SCORE-15的心理测量特性和内部一致性可靠性，(b)临床反应性，(c)规范性(意大利语)标准。

source: Furthermore, (d) the study sought to evaluate the participants' representation of both their family and their problems, analyzing open-ended questions included in the SCORE-15.
target: 此外，(d)研究试图评估参与者对其家庭及其问题的代表性，分析SCORE-15中包含的开放式问题。

source: Data were collected from two clinical centers for 208 families (n = 507).
target: 从两个临床中心收集了208个家庭(n=507)的数据。

source: Results confirmed the three-factor structure (i.e., strengths, difficulties, and communication), a good internal consistency reliability, and indicated a cutoff threshold for the Italian version.
target: 结果证实了三因素结构(即优势、难度和沟通)、良好的内部一致性可靠性，并指出了意大利语版本的截止阈值。

source: Furthermore, results showed that SCORE-15 is a good instrument for clinical responsiveness and that it can be used to explore the way in which family members describe their families and problems.
target: 此外，结果显示，SCORE-15是临床反应性的良好工具，可用于探索家庭成员描述其家庭和问题的方式。

source: Overall, SCORE-15 is a brief, psychometrically robust family assessment instrument that may be used for both researchers and practitioners in several domains of clinical and social psychology.
target: 总体而言，SCORE-15是一种简短的、心理测量稳健的家庭评估工具，可用于临床和社会心理学多个领域的研究人员和从业者。

source: To estimate the magnitude of illicit cigarette consumption in India using a tax-gap approach.
target: 使用税收差距方法估计印度非法香烟消费的规模。

source: In the tax-gap analysis, illicit cigarette consumption in India was defined as the difference between total and legal consumption.
target: 在税收差距分析中，印度的非法香烟消费被定义为总消费和合法消费之间的差异。

source: Data on total cigarette consumption came from two national Global Adult Tobacco Surveys carried out from 2009 to 2010 and from 2016 to 2017.
target: 关于香烟总消费量的数据来自于2009年至2010年和2016年至2017年进行的两项全国性全球成人烟草调查。

source: Legal consumption was derived from Government of India data on domestic cigarette production and trade.
target: 合法消费来自印度政府关于国内香烟生产和贸易的数据。

source: Estimated total cigarette consumption was 104.8 billion sticks in 2009 to 2010 and 94.2 billion sticks in 2016 to 2017, a decrease of 10.6 billion sticks, or of 10%, over the time period.
target: 据估计，2009年至2010年的香烟总消费量为1 048亿支，2016年至2017年为942亿支，在此期间减少了106亿支，或10%。

source: Legal cigarette consumption fell from 99.4 to 88.5 billion sticks over the same period, a drop of 11%.
target: 同期法定卷烟消费量从99.4亿支下降到885亿支，下降11%。

source: Estimated illicit cigarette consumption was, therefore, 5.4 billion sticks in 2009 to 2010 and 5.6 billion sticks in 2016 to 2017, and accounted for 5.1% and 6.0% of the market in these periods, respectively.
target: 因此，估计2009年至2010年的非法香烟消费量为54亿支，2016年至2017年为56亿支，分别占这些时期市场的5.1%和6.0%。

source: Consequently, only about 1 in 20 cigarettes consumed in India was illicit.
target: 因此，在印度消费的20支香烟中只有1支是非法的。

source: Between 2016 and 2017, the estimated equivalent retail sales value of illicit cigarettes was 49 billion Indian rupees (753 million United States dollars, US$) and the estimated tax revenue foregone was 25 billion Indian rupees (US$ 390 million).
target: 在2016年至2017年期间，非法香烟的估计等效零售额为490亿印地安卢比(7.53亿美元，美元)，估计先期税收为250亿印地安卢比(3.9亿美元)。

source: Illicit cigarette consumption is relatively modest in India by global standards.
target: 按照全球标准，印度的非法香烟消费量相对较少。

source: Nonetheless, India should strengthen its capacity to control the illicit tobacco market as part of a comprehensive tobacco control strategy, while also continuing to implement traditional demand reduction measures, such as tobacco taxation.
target: 因此，作为全面烟草控制战略的一部分，印度应加强其控制非法烟草市场的能力，同时也应继续执行传统的减少需求措施，如烟草税。

source: Enhancer of zeste homolog 2(EZH2) is a histone methyltransferase which regulate gene expression through epigenetic machinery.
target: zeste homolog 2增强子2(EZH2)是一种通过表观遗传机制调节基因表达的组蛋白甲基转移酶。

source: The abnormal expression of EZH2 has been described in many cancer types.
target: EZH2在许多癌症类型中的异常表达已被描述。

source: With in-depth study, it was found that EZH2 is involved in the occurrence and development in many kinds of malignant hematologic disease which may play a dual role of oncogenes and tumor suppressor genes.
target: 随着研究的深入，发现EZH2参与了多种恶性血液病的发生和发展，可能发挥癌基因和抑癌基因的双重作用。

source: In recent years, the emergence of EZH2 inhibitors provide a new option for the future treatment of hematological malignancies.
target: 近年来，EZH2抑制剂的出现为未来治疗血液恶性肿瘤提供了新的选择。

source: In this review, the expression and clinical significance of EZH2 in various of hematological tumors were summarized briefly.
target: 本文就EZH2在多种血液系统肿瘤中的表达及其临床意义作一综述。

source: Ancient medical books have the names of drugs such as "xinghe" (, apricot pit), but there is only the name "xingren" (, almond) in modern medical books.
target: 古代医书有“杏仁”(、杏坑)等药名，但现代医书仅有“杏仁”(、杏仁)之名。

source: On the basis of checking Chinese dictionary, exegetical books and ancient literature, it is believed that the ancients could clearly distinguish the difference between "he" (, pit) and "ren" (, nut) in actual use, and realized that the pit and the nut are different parts.
target: 在查阅中国词典、训诂书籍和古代文献的基础上，认为古人在实际使用中能够清楚地区分“和”(、坑)和“仁”(、坚果)的区别，并认识到坑和坚果是不同的部分。

source: This article takes almonds as the center to explore the similarities and differences of concepts and essences between the "he" (, pit) and "ren" (, nut) in ancient prescriptions.
target: 本文以杏仁为中心，探讨古方中“和”(、坑)与“仁”(、坚果)在概念和实质上的异同。

source: By investigating the usage of ancient medical literature, it can be seen that the actual medicinal part of the medicine "xinghe" (, apricot pit) means still almonds.
target: 通过对古代医学文献用法的调查，可以看出，药物的实际药用部分“杏荷”(，杏坑)的意思仍然是杏仁。

source: And due to the imperfect market of ancient medicinal materials, there is no perfect medicinal materials processing industry, and it is necessary for doctors to remove part of the non-medicinal parts after obtaining the medicinal materials.
target: 而且由于古代药材市场的不完善，没有完善的药材加工业，医生在获取药材后，需要去除部分非药用部分。

source: Therefore, in ancient times, the "xinghe" (, apricot pit) and "xingren" (, almond) are actually different names for the same medicinal part.
target: 因此，在古代，“杏荷”(，杏坑)和“杏仁”(，杏仁)实际上是同一药用部位的不同名称。

source: Faldaprevir analogue molecule (FAM) has been reported to effectively inhibit the catalytic activity of HCV NS3/4A protease, making it a potential lead compound against HCV.
target: 据报道，Faldaprevir类似物分子(FAM)能有效抑制HCV NS3/4A蛋白酶的催化活性，使其成为一种潜在的抗HCV先导化合物。

source: A series of HCV NS3/4A protease crystal structures were analyzed by bioinformatics methods, and the FAM-HCV NS3/4A protease crystal structure was chosen for this study.
target: 采用生物信息学方法分析了一系列HCV NS3/4A蛋白酶晶体结构，选择FAM-HCV NS3/4A蛋白酶晶体结构进行本研究。

source: A 20.4 ns molecular dynamics simulation of the complex consists of HCV NS3/4A protease and FAM was conducted.
target: 对由HCV NS3/4A蛋白酶和FAM组成的复合物进行了20.4 ns的分子动力学模拟。

source: The key amino acid residues for interaction and the binding driving force for the molecular recognition between the protease and FAM were identified from the hydrogen bonds and binding free energy analyses.
target: 从氢键和结合自由能分析中确定了蛋白酶与FAM相互作用的关键氨基酸残基和分子识别的结合驱动力。

source: With the driving force of hydrogen bonds and van der Waals, FAM specifically bind to the active pocket of HCV NS3/4A protease, including V130-S137, F152-D166, D77-D79 and V55, which agreed with the experimental data.
target: 在氢键和范德华驱动下，FAM特异性结合HCV NS3/4A蛋白酶活性囊袋，包括V130-S137、F152-D166、D77-D79和V55，与实验数据一致。

source: The effect of R155K, D168E/V and V170T site-directed mutagenesis on FAM molecular recognition was analyzed for their effect on drug resistance, which provided the possible molecular explanation of FAM resistance.
target: 分析了R155K、D168E/V和V170T定点突变对FAM分子识别的影响，为FAM耐药提供了可能的分子解释。

source: Finally, the system conformational change was explored by using free energy landscape and conformational cluster.
target: 最后，利用自由能景观和构象簇探索了系统构象变化。

source: The result showed four kinds of dominant conformation, which provides theoretical basis for subsequent design of Faldaprevir analogue inhibitors based on the structure of HCV NS3/4A protease.
target: 结果表明了4种显性构象，为后续设计基于HCV NS3/4A蛋白酶结构的Faldaprevir类似物抑制剂提供了理论依据。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
target: 目的研究卤代羟基烷烃类吸入麻醉药对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
target: 方法采用顶空气相色谱双柱确证检测方法对卤代羟基烷烃进行分析。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
target: 探讨了KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2和强生DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱不同检测条件下卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱测定血液样品中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
target: 结果使用强生W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚和安氟醚的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇的保留时间相似，干扰了血液中乙醇含量的检测；只有强生DB-ALC1气相色谱柱可以分离七氟醚和乙醇成分，从而消除了它们对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
target: 当采用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚、异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，尤其是七氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，且七氟醚明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
target: 结论卤代羟基烷烃干扰顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量。

source: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
target: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地鉴别干扰。

source: To investigate the method of treating tuberculosis in the craniovertebral junction and its effectiveness.
target: 探讨颅椎交界处结核的治疗方法及其疗效。

source: The clinical data of 18 patients with tuberculosis in the craniovertebral junction between July 2010 and January 2019 was analyzed retrospectively.
target: 方法回顾性分析2010年7月至2019年1月收治的18例颅椎交界处结核患者的临床资料。

source: There were 14 males and 4 females, aged 21 months to 75 years (median, 35 years).
target: 男14例，女4例，年龄21个月~75岁(中位35岁)。

source: The disease duration ranged from 2 weeks to 60 months (median, 4 months), and the affected segment was C  All the patients were followed up 3 to 42 months (median, 12 months).
target: 病程2周~60个月(中位数4个月)，受累节段为C所有患者随访3~42个月(中位数12个月)。

source: At 3 months after treatment, the VAS score was 1.7±1.0, showing significant difference when compared with preoperative score (  On the premise of regular chemotherapy, if there is no huge abscess causing dysphagia or dyspnea, atlantoaxial instability, and neurological symptoms, patients can undergo conservative treatment. If not, however, the transoral approach can be used to completely remove the tuberculosis lesion in the craniovertebral junction. One-stage debridement via transoral approach combined with posterior cervical fusion and internal fixation can achieve satisfactory effectiveness.
target: 治疗后3个月，VAS评分为1.7±1.0，与术前评分比较有显着性差异(在常规化疗的前提下，如果没有巨大脓肿引起吞咽困难或呼吸困难、寰枢椎不稳定和神经症状，患者可以接受保守治疗。然而，如果不能，经口入路可用于彻底清除颅骨-椎骨连接处的结核病灶。经口入路一期清创联合颈椎后路融合内固定术可取得满意疗效。

source: To evaluate the clinical characteristics, genetic abnormalities, treatment efficacy and prognostic factors in patients with plasma cell leukemia(PCL).
target: 评价浆细胞白血病(PCL)患者的临床特点、遗传异常、治疗效果及影响预后的因素。

source: 30 patients diagnosed as PCL in our hospital from January 1993 to December 2019 were enrolled, and the clinical characteristics, laboratory findings, therapeutic regimes, and survival data of the patients were retrospectively analyzed.
target: 选择1993年1月至2019年12月在我院确诊为PCL的患者30例，回顾性分析患者的临床特点、实验室检查结果、治疗方案及生存资料。

source: The median age of the 30 patients was 56.5 (28-80) years old, among them, 25 patients were primary plasma cell leukemia, and 5 patients were secondary plasma cell leukemia.
target: 30例患者的中位年龄为56.5(28-80)岁，其中25例为原发性浆细胞白血病，5例为继发性浆细胞白血病。

source: Complex karyotypes and subdiploids were most common in cytogenetic abnormalities.
target: 细胞遗传学异常以复杂核型和亚二倍体多见。

source: Among the 20 cases of chromosome G banding, 11 (55%) cases were complex karyotypes and 8 (40%) cases were hypodiploid.
target: 20例染色体G显带中，复杂核型11例(55%)，亚二倍体8例(40%)。

source: Fluorescent in situ hybridization (FISH) test showed that among 11 cases, 6 cases showed 17p13 deletion, 8 cases showed at least two kinds of abnormalities, which including t (14; 16), t (8; 14), t (11;14), 17p13 deletion, and 13q14 deletion.
target: 荧光原位杂交(fluorescent in situ hybridization,FISH)试验显示，11例患者中，6例显示17p13缺失，8例显示至少2种异常，包括t(14; 16)、t(8; 14)、t(11;14)、17p13缺失和13q14缺失。

source: The median overall survival (OS) time was 10.5 months for all patients.
target: 所有患者的中位总生存(OS)时间为10.5个月。

source: The median OS time of the patients in ECOG score ≤ 2 group was 21.5 months, which was significantly longer than those in the ECOG score>2 group(1.2 months) (P=0.017).
target: ECOG评分≤ 2组患者的中位OS时间为21.5个月，明显长于ECOG评分>2组患者的中位OS时间(1.2个月)(P=0.017)。

source: The median OS time of the patients treated with novel agents (including proteasome inhibitor and/or immunomodulator) was 24.9 months, which was significantly longer than the patients treated with traditional chemotherapy group(10.5 months) (P＜0.001).
target: 接受新型药物(包括蛋白酶体抑制剂和/或免疫调节剂)治疗的患者的中位OS时间为24.9个月，显着长于接受传统化疗的患者(10.5个月)(P<0.001)。

source: For the patients treated with novel agents, the median OS time of patients accepted two novel agents combination was 30.9 months, which was longer than those of single novel agent(11.5 months) (P=0.021).
target: 对于接受新型药物治疗的患者，接受两种新型药物联合治疗的患者中位OS时间为30.9个月，比接受单一新型药物治疗的患者中位OS时间(11.5个月)长(P=0.021)。

source: The effect of genetic abnormolity to the OS of the patients showed no statistical difference.
target: 遗传异常对患者OS的影响差异无统计学意义。

source: Multivariate statistical analysis showed that ECOG score>2 was the independent prognostic factor of plasma cell leukemia patients.
target: 多因素统计分析显示，ECOG评分>2是影响浆细胞白血病患者预后的独立因素。

source: There were two patients underwent allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation in the study,but died due to the pulmonary infection within 6 months after transplantation.
target: 本研究中有2例患者接受了异基因造血干细胞移植，但在移植后6个月内因肺部感染而死亡。

source: In the era of novel agents, ECOG score is an independent prognostic factor of plasma cell leukemia.
target: 在新药物时代，ECOG评分是影响浆细胞白血病预后的独立因素。

source: Multiple novel agents treatment should be underwent as soon as possible to improve the prognosis of the patients.
target: 应尽快接受多种新型药物治疗，以改善患者的预后。

source: Pulmonary infection is a common factor that cause the death of the patients after allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation.
target: 肺部感染是导致异基因造血干细胞移植术后患者死亡的常见因素。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
target: 比较前路皮下骨盆内固定器(INFIX)与钢板内固定治疗不稳定型骨盆前环骨折的疗效。

source: The clinical data of 48 patients with unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures who met the selection criteria between June 2014 and December 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.
target: 方法回顾性分析2014年6月至2019年12月期间符合入选标准的48例不稳定型骨盆前环骨折患者的临床资料。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
target: 其中21例采用INFIX治疗(INFIX组)，27例采用钢板治疗(钢板组)。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
target: 两组患者在性别、年龄、体重指数、损伤原因、损伤至手术时间、损伤严重程度评分(ISS)、骨折类型等方面差异无统计学意义(两组患者平均随访12.5个月(范围，6~16个月))。

source: The operation time and intraoperative blood loss in INFIX group were significantly lower than those in plate group (  Compared with the plate internal fixation, the INFIX internal fixation can obtain the similar effectiveness for the unstable anterior pelvic ring fracture and has the advantages of shorter operation time, less blood loss, and lower risk of infection.
target: INFIX组手术时间及术中出血量均显着低于钢板组(与钢板内固定相比，对于不稳定的前骨盆环骨折，INFIX内固定可获得相似的效果，具有手术时间短、出血量少、感染风险低的优点。

source: To investigate the clinical significance of the targeted next-generation sequencing assay for patients with suspected myeloid malignancies.
target: 探讨有针对性的下一代测序分析在疑似髓系恶性肿瘤患者中的临床意义。

source: A total of 39 hematopenia patients with suspected myeloid malignamies in Department of Hematology of The Affiliated Huai'an No.1 People's Hospital of Nanjing Medical University from January 2018 to April 2019 were treated, 20 hot spot genes of myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) were detected.
target: 2018年1月至2019年4月，南京医科大学附属淮安第一人民医院血液科共收治39例疑似骨髓恶性疾病的血细胞减少患者，检测骨髓增生异常综合征(MDS)热点基因20个，

source: Regarding the diagnostic type, there were 7 cases of idiopathic cytopenia of undetermined significance (ICUS), 8 cases of clonal cytopenias of undetermined significance (CCUS) and 24 cases of myeloid myeloid malignancies which included 18 cases of MDS, 4 cases of myelodysplastic/myeloproliferative neoplasms (MDS/MPN) and 2 cases of acute myeloid leukemia.
target: 在诊断类型方面，特发性显着性细胞减少症(ICUS)7例，显着性克隆性细胞减少症(CCUS)8例，髓样恶性肿瘤24例，其中MDS 18例，骨髓增生异常/骨髓增生性肿瘤(MDS/MPN)4例，急性髓细胞白血病2例。

source: Positive mutation was detected in 70.8% (17/24) of myeloid malignancy patients , and 72.7% (16/22) in MDS and MDS/MPN patients.
target: 在70.8%(17/24)的髓细胞恶性肿瘤患者中检测到阳性突变，在MDS和MDS/MPN患者中检测到72.7%(16/22)的突变。

source: The main mutation types were ASXL1, TET2 and RUNX1.
target: 主要突变类型为ASXL1、TET2和RUNX1。

source: Compared with gene negative group, there were no significant differences in sex, age (＜60 years old or ≥60 years old), proportion of bone marrow blast cells (＜5% or≥5%) and cytogenetics (good, medium and poor) (P＞0.05).
target: 与基因阴性组比较，性别、年龄(< 60岁或≥60岁)、骨髓原始细胞比例(< 5%或≥5%)、细胞遗传学(好、中、差)均无显着性差异(P>0.05)。

source: Furthermore, all 8 CCUS patients showed positive mutation, and the incidence of double or multiple mutation in CCUS group was significantly lower than that of the MDS and MDS/MPN group (37.5% vs 54.5%) (P=0.002).
target: 此外，所有8例CCUS患者均显示阳性突变，且CCUS组双突变或多突变的发生率显着低于MDS和MDS/MPN组(37.5% vs 54.5%)(P=0.002)。

source: The mutation types between the two groups were similar, and there was no significant difference in variant allele frequency (P＞0.05).
target: 两组突变类型相似，变异等位基因频率差异无统计学意义(P>0.05)。

source: Our results suggest that there are high rates of double or multiple mutations in myeloid malignancies, especially in patients with MDS and MDS/MPN.
target: 我们的结果提示，髓样恶性肿瘤中存在高比率的双突变或多突变，特别是在MDS和MDS/MPN患者中。

source: Targeted sequencing assay can improve the diagnosis of myeloid malignancies, and guide clinical treatment.
target: ct测序分析可提高髓系恶性肿瘤的诊断，指导临床治疗。

source: Agreement and correlation are widely-used concepts that assess the association between variables.
target: 一致性和相关性是评估变量之间关联的广泛使用的概念。

source: Although similar and related, they represent completely different notions of association.
target: 虽然相似和相关，但它们代表了完全不同的关联概念。

source: Assessing agreement between variables assumes that the variables measure the same construct, while correlation of variables can be assessed for variables that measure completely different constructs.
target: 评估变量之间的一致性假设变量测量相同的构造，而对于测量完全不同构造的变量，可以评估变量的相关性。

source: This conceptual difference requires the use of different statistical methods, and when assessing agreement or correlation, the statistical method may vary depending on the distribution of the data and the interest of the investigator.
target: 这种概念上的差异需要使用不同的统计方法，在评估一致性或相关性时，统计方法可根据数据的分布和研究者的兴趣而变化。

source: For example, the Pearson correlation, a popular measure of correlation between continuous variables, is only informative when applied to variables that have linear relationships; it may be non-informative or even misleading when applied to variables that are not linearly related.
target: 例如，Pearson相关性是连续变量之间相关性的一种流行度量，只有当应用于具有线性关系的变量时，才具有信息性；当应用于非线性关系的变量时，它可能是非信息性的，甚至是误导性的。

source: Likewise, the intraclass correlation, a popular measure of agreement between continuous variables, may not provide sufficient information for investigators if the nature of poor agreement is of interest.
target: 同样，玻璃内相关性(连续变量之间一致性的一种常用度量)可能不能为研究者提供足够的信息，如果一致性差的性质是有意义的。

target_errors.term: 如果一致性差的性质是有意义的

source: This report reviews the concepts of agreement and correlation and discusses differences in the application of several commonly used measures.
target: 本报告回顾了一致性和相关性的概念，并讨论了几种常用度量在应用中的差异。

source: Child welfare systems (CWSs) worldwide show increased interest in adopting empirically informed clinical strategies to increase treatment effectiveness.
target: 全世界的儿童福利系统(CWS)对采用经验知情的临床策略以提高治疗效果表现出越来越大的兴趣。

source: Many empirically supported treatments (ESTs) exist, but little is known about EST implementation barriers and facilitators in CWS.
target: 存在许多经验支持的治疗(EST)，但对CWS中的EST实施障碍和促进因素知之甚少。

source: This study explored CWS providers' experiences of implementing attachment-based family therapy (ABFT) in home-based services of the Flemish CWS (in Belgium).
target: 本研究探讨了CWS提供者在比利时佛兰芒CWS家庭服务中实施基于附件的家庭治疗(ABFT)的经验。

source: Sixteen CWS providers (twelve counselors and four supervisors) involved in three home-based services were interviewed.
target: 访谈了参与三项家庭服务的16名CWS提供者(12名顾问和4名监督员)。

source: The Consolidated Framework for Implementation Research (CFIR) was used to guide collection, coding, and analysis of interview data.
target: 实施研究综合框架(CFIR)用于指导访谈数据的收集、编码和分析。

source: Findings revealed that implementation success was related to ABFT's fit with the CWS's mission, philosophy, and existing practices.
target: 评估显示，实施成功与ABFT是否符合CWS的使命、理念和现有实践相关。

source: CWS providers' belief in the compatibility between ABFT and CWS increased investment in implementation efforts and persistence to overcome challenges and setbacks.
target: CWS提供商相信ABFT和CWS之间的兼容性，这就增加了对实施努力的投资，并增加了克服挑战和挫折的坚持。

source: Some barriers pertained to the learning of ABFT and some barriers pertained to systems level challenges such as lack of leadership and support, poor coordination with referral sources and other youth care partners, and lack of policy support.
target: 一些障碍与学习ABFT有关，一些障碍与系统一级的挑战有关，如缺乏领导和支持、与转诊来源和其他青年护理伙伴的协调不力以及缺乏政策支持。

source: For successful expansion of ESTs into CWS settings, various barriers at multiple systemic levels need to be addressed.
target: 为了成功地将EST扩展到CWS环境中，需要解决多个系统层面上的各种障碍。

source: To evaluate all simulation models for ophthalmology technical and non-technical skills training and the strength of evidence to support their validity and effectiveness.
target: 评价用于眼科技术和非技术技能培训的所有模拟模型以及支持其有效性和有效性的证据强度。

source: A systematic search was performed using PubMed and Embase for studies published from inception to 01/07/2019.
target: 使用PubMed和Embase对从研究开始至2019年07月1日发表的研究进行系统搜索。

source: Studies were analysed according to the training modality: virtual reality; wet-lab; dry-lab models; e-learning.
target: 根据培训模式：虚拟现实；湿实验室；干实验室模型；电子学习对研究进行分析。

source: The educational impact of studies was evaluated using Messick's validity framework and McGaghie's model of translational outcomes for evaluating effectiveness.
target: 使用Messick的有效性框架和McGaghie的翻译结果模型评估有效性，评估研究的教育影响。

source: One hundred and thirty-one studies were included in this review, with 93 different simulators described.
target: 本综述纳入了131项研究，描述了93种不同的模拟器。

source: Fifty-three studies were based on virtual reality tools; 47 on wet-lab models; 26 on dry-lab models; 5 on e-learning.
target: 53项研究基于虚拟现实工具；47项研究基于湿实验室模型；26项研究基于干实验室模型；5项研究基于电子学习。

source: Only two studies provided evidence for all five sources of validity assessment.
target: 只有两项研究为所有5个有效性评估来源提供了证据。

source: Models with the strongest validity evidence were the Eyesi Surgical, Eyesi Direct Ophthalmoscope and Eye Surgical Skills Assessment Test.
target: 具有最强有效性证据的模型是Eyesi Surgical、Eyesi Direct Ophthalmoscope和Eye Surgical技能评估测试。

source: Effectiveness ratings for simulator models were mostly limited to level 2 (contained effects) with the exception of the Sophocle vitreoretinal surgery simulator, which was shown at level 3 (downstream effects), and the Eyesi at level 5 (target effects) for cataract surgery.
target: 模拟器模型的有效性评级大多限于2级(包含效应)，但Sophocle玻璃体视网膜手术模拟器除外，它显示在3级(下游效应)，Eyesi显示在白内障手术的5级(目标效应)。

source: A wide range of models have been described but only the Eyesi has undergone comprehensive investigation.
target: 已经描述了广泛的模型，但只有Eyesi经过了全面的研究。

target_errors.term: 已经描述了广泛的模型

source: The main weakness is in the poor quality of study design, with a predominance of descriptive reports showing limited validity evidence and few studies investigating the effects of simulation training on patient outcomes.
target: 主要弱点在于研究设计的质量差，大多数描述性报告显示有限的有效性证据，很少有研究调查模拟训练对患者结局的影响。

source: More robust research is needed to enable effective implementation of simulation tools into current training curriculums.
target: 需要进行更有力的研究，以便能够在当前的培训课程中有效地实施模拟工具。

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
target: Scarce定性文献侧重于理解参与犯罪的青少年的父母的观点，以前的文献没有研究作为参与犯罪的青少年的父母的地位如何与作为移民父母的交叉。

target_errors.term: 如何与作为移民父母的交叉

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
target: 目前的现象学研究通过移民父母的眼睛考察了他们如何理解其子女参与犯罪行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
target: 这项研究调查了对14名来自前苏联在以色列的移民父母(10名母亲和4名父亲)在犯罪青年康复设施中接受治疗的儿童进行的深入的半结构化访谈。

target_errors.term: 在犯罪青年康复设施中接受治疗的儿童

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
target: 数据分析显示，由于青春期发育阶段、移民压力和文化冲突，儿童的行为逐渐下降。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
target: 这三个因素交织在一起，形成了一种结构，在这种结构中，他们看到自己的孩子转向犯罪。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
target: 试图将亲子关系理想化，并将所犯罪行的严重程度降到最低，以平衡父母逐渐失去控制的情况。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
target: 他们描述了自己作为父母的各种不同甚至矛盾的经历，以及他们努力拼凑自己作为父母的缺乏凝聚力的、交替的经历。

source: Despite the critical role they can play in their children's rehabilitation, as well as the distress that they themselves experience, parents of children involved in delinquent behavior have often been ignored in research.
target: 尽管他们在孩子的康复中可以起到至关重要的作用，他们自己也经历了痛苦，但参与犯罪行为的孩子的父母在研究中往往被忽视。

source: Acknowledging parents' perspectives and experiences can allow development of appropriate therapeutic strategies to support them and maximize their abilities to support their children.
target: 评估父母的观点和经验可以制定适当的治疗策略来支持他们，并最大限度地提高他们支持子女的能力。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
target: 在过去十年中，报告的手持激光诱发黄斑病变(HLIM)病例急剧增加，由于在线获取高功率激光不受监管，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。

source: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.
target: 虽然HLIM具有独特的临床特征，但并非罕见，它可伪装成其他视网膜疾病。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
target: 因此，识别这种重要且潜在破坏性疾病的临床和多模态成像特征是至关重要的。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
target: 由于HLIM患者通常较年轻，需要考虑独特的问题，如延迟出现、困难病史、依从性差以及行为或精神合并症。

source: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
target: 本文将综述激光损伤的临床和诊断特点，并特别强调多模态视网膜表现。

source: In addition, we present a unique case of HLIM, resembling the presentation of a placoid disease variant and illustrating choroidal ischaemia using advanced retinal imaging, that offers further insight into the mechanisms of laser injury and its complications.
target: 此外，我们报告了一个独特的HLIM病例，类似于安慰剂疾病变异型的表现，并使用高级视网膜成像说明脉络膜缺血，为激光损伤及其并发症的机制提供了进一步的见解。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
target: 本综述中讨论的问题旨在提高对一种具有潜在严重视觉并发症的日益重要的趋势疾病的认识。

source: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
target: 比较机器人系统辅助下椎弓根螺钉置入与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入在上胸外科手术中的安全性和准确性。

source: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
target: 2017年12月至2019年12月，39例采用上胸椎椎弓根螺钉内固定术的患者纳入研究，其中机器人组(A组，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入)19例，徒手组(B组，徒手椎弓根螺钉置入)20例。

source: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.
target: A组植入螺钉104枚，B组植入螺钉108枚。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
target: 两组在年龄、性别构成、体重指数、疾病类型、植入螺钉数量、节段分布等方面差异无统计学意义(A组手术时间明显长于B组)(与传统徒手椎弓根螺钉置入相比，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入显着提高了螺钉置入的准确性和安全性，且不增加出血和术后引流。

source: To investigate the effectiveness of anterolateral femoral flap in combination with fascia lata grafting in repair of large Achilles tendon and skin defects.
target: 探讨股前外侧皮瓣联合阔筋膜移植修复大跟腱及皮肤缺损的效果。

source: The clinical data of 18 patients with large Achilles tendon and skin defects repaired with anterolateral femoral flap in combination with fascia lata grafting between January 2018 and January 2019 were retrospectively reviewed.
target: 方法回顾性回顾2018年1月至2019年1月采用股前外侧皮瓣联合阔筋膜移植修复18例跟腱及皮肤大缺损患者的临床资料。

source: There were 14 males and 4 females; age ranged from 32 to 57 years (mean, 42.1 years).
There were 9 cases of postoperative infection of Achilles tendon rupture, 1 case of traffic accident injury, and 8 cases of combined infection of skin and Achilles tendon defects after heel trauma.
target: 跟腱断裂术后感染9例，交通事故伤1例，足跟外伤后皮肤及跟腱缺损合并感染8例。

source: The length of Achilles tendon defect was 4-8 cm, with an average of 5.6 cm; the range of the skin defect was 14 cm×3 cm to 20 cm×5 cm.
target: 跟腱缺损长度4~8cm，平均5.6 cm；皮肤缺损范围14cm×3cm~20cm×5cm。

source: Flap survival was observed, and ankle function recovery was evaluated according to McComis functional assessment criteria, and dorsal extension and plantar flexion mobility of the affected limb were measured at last follow-up and compared with those of the healthy side.
target: 观察皮瓣成活情况，根据McComis功能评估标准评价踝关节功能恢复情况，末次随访时测量患肢背伸、足底屈曲活动度，并与健侧进行比较。

source: Eighteen cases were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.7 months.
target: 18例随访8~24个月，平均16.7个月。

source: All the flaps survived after operation, the flaps were soft and elastic, and the incisions healed by first intention.
target: 术后所有皮瓣均成活，皮瓣柔软有弹性，切口均一期愈合。

source: At last follow-up, 15 cases were excellent, 2 cases were good, and 1 case was acceptable according to McComis functional evaluation criteria, with an excellent and good rate of 94.4%.
target: 末次随访时，根据McComis功能评价标准，优15例，良2例，可接受1例，优良率为94.4%。

source: The two-point discrimination of the heel posterior region of the affected foot was 4-7 mm, with an average of 5.32 mm.
target: 患足跟后区两点辨别度为4~7mm，平均5.32 mm。

source: The heel-raise test was negative.
target: 足跟抬高试验阴性。

source: The dorsiflexion range of the affected side was (21.55±1.26)°, which was significantly different from that of the healthy side (25.23±1.45)° (  The application of anterolateral femoral flap in combination with fascia lata grafting for the repair of large Achilles tendon and skin defects can achieve good effectiveness.
target: 患侧背屈范围为(21.55±1.26)°，与健侧有显着性差异(25.23±1.45)°(应用股前外侧皮瓣联合阔筋膜移植修复大跟腱及皮肤缺损可取得良好的效果)。

source: Chronic hepatitis B (CHB) poses a serious threat to the health of the Chinese people.
target: 慢性乙型肝炎(CHB)严重威胁着中国人的健康。

source: Viral markers are of great significance during antiviral therapy and research and development of innovative drugs.
target: 病毒标志物在抗病毒治疗和创新药物研发过程中具有重要意义。

source: However, traditional serovirological markers such as HBV DNA and hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg) have certain limitations in assessing the efficacy of antiviral treatment and accurately reflecting the transcriptional activity of covalently closed circular DNA (cccDNA).
target: 然而，传统的血清病毒学标志物如HBV DNA和乙型肝炎表面抗原(HBsAg)在评估抗病毒治疗的疗效和准确反映共价闭合环状DNA(cccDNA)的转录活性方面存在一定的局限性。

source: In recent years, the role of new viral markers such as HBV RNA, hepatitis B core-related antigen (HBcrAg) and quantitative anti-hepatitis B core protein (qAnti-HBc) have attracted more and more attention because of accurately reflecting the transcription activity of cccDNA, determining the therapeutic effect and predicting the risk of recurrence after drug discontinuation.
target: 近年来，HBV RNA、乙型肝炎核心相关抗原(HBcrAg)、定量抗乙型肝炎核心蛋白(qAnti-HBc)等新型病毒标志物的作用，由于能准确反映cccDNA的转录活性，确定治疗效果，预测停药后复发的风险，受到越来越多的关注。

source: This article briefly introduces the application of new and old markers in various stages of antiviral therapy in CHB patients, and combines the application of new viral markers in the evaluation of drug efficacy, and expounds its possible role in the research and development of new antiviral therapy.
target: 本文简要介绍了新老标志物在CHB患者抗病毒治疗各阶段的应用，并结合新病毒标志物在药物疗效评价中的应用，阐述了其在新型抗病毒疗法研发中可能发挥的作用。

source: Canine atopic dermatitis (cAD) is a common inflammatory and pruritic skin disease, with various treatment options.
target: 犬特应性皮炎(cAD)是一种常见的炎症性和瘙痒性皮肤病，有多种治疗选择。

source: The use of topical products containing natural ingredients has proven increasingly popular.
target: 使用含有天然成分的外用产品已证明越来越流行。

source: To evaluate the effects of a spray solution containing heat-killed Lactobacillus rhamnosus and L. reuteri, on the clinical signs and cutaneous microbiota of atopic dogs.
target: 评价含有热杀灭鼠李糖乳杆菌和罗氏乳杆菌的喷雾溶液对特应性犬的临床体征和皮肤微生物群的影响。

source: Ten privately owned, mildly affected, nonseasonally atopic dogs.
target: 10只私人饲养的、受轻度影响的、非季节性特应性的狗。

source: The spray was applied to the ventrum every 24 h for 28 days.
target: 每24 h喷于腹腔，共28天。

source: Clinical scores, skin barrier function and owner assessment were evaluated on day (D)0, D14, D28 and D42.
target: 在第(D)0天、第14天、第28天和第42天评价临床评分、皮肤屏障功能和所有者评估。

source: The cutaneous microbiota was analysed on D0 and D28.
target: 在D0和D28上分析皮肤微生物区系。

source: A reduction in the total clinical score was seen at each time point (D14, P = 0.03; D28, P = 0.04; D42, P = 0.001).
target: 在每个时间点观察到临床总分降低(D14，P=0.03；D28，P=0.04；D42，P=0.001)。

source: A reduction in the regional clinical scores was seen after D28 (P = 0.01) and D42 (P = 0.003).
target: D28(P=0.01)和D42(P=0.003)后观察到区域临床评分降低。

source: A significant reduction in the pruritus score was seen on D42 (P = 0.01).
target: D42组瘙痒评分显着降低(P=0.01)。

source: A lower hydration value was seen on D28 (P = 0.02) and D42 (P = 0.02) on the pinnae.
A good-to-excellent response and an easy-to-use administration was reported by owners.
target: 业主报告了从好到好的反应和易于使用的给药。

source: There were no significant changes in the cutaneous microbiota after 28 days.
target: 28 d后皮肤微生物区系无明显变化。

source: There was a significant and rapid decrease in the clinical signs associated with cAD after use of the spray.
target: 使用喷雾剂后，与cAD相关的临床体征显着迅速下降。

source: Future larger, randomized, controlled studies are needed to confirm these results and to assess the effects on the cutaneous immunity and microflora of atopic dogs.
target: 未来需要更大规模的随机对照研究来证实这些结果，并评估对特应性犬皮肤免疫和微生物群的影响。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
target: 本综述评估了视网膜分支静脉阻塞(BRVO)继发黄斑水肿治疗的真实世界证据。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
target: 对来自48项治疗继发于BRVO的黄斑水肿的真实世界研究的2530只眼进行了荟萃分析。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
target: 记录基线特征、视觉、解剖和安全性结果。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
target: 计算6个月、12个月和24个月时视力(VA)和中心亚场厚度(CST)变化的来自随机效应模型的加权平均和加权估计值。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
target: 主要结局为12个月时VA(logMAR字母)的变化。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
target: 使用卫生经济研究所开发的病例系列质量评估检查表评估研究质量。

source: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.
target: 汇总数据的平均基线VA为54.0(51.5，56.5)个字母，平均基线CST为501.3(483.5，519.1)微米。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in VA was 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) letters at 12 months (n = 1727).
target: 12个月时VA平均(95% CI)变化的随机效应估计值为14.6(12.5,16.7)个字母(n=1727)。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in CST was -181.7 (-230.7, -132.7) µm at 12 months (n = 1325).
target: 12个月时CST平均(95% CI)变化的随机效应估计值为-181.7(-230.7，-132.7)μm(n = 1325)。

source: The quality of studies varied considerably.
target: 研究的质量差异很大。

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
target: 分别有79%和42%的治疗组讨论了眼部和全身不良事件，可能存在漏报。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
target: 在现实世界中抗VEGF治疗获得的视觉和解剖学收益不如精液RCT令人印象深刻，这可能是由于现实世界中注射频率的降低和基线特征的差异。

source: There is an urgent need for consensus on the minimum efficacy, treatment burden and safety data to collect to strengthen the real-world evidence base.
target: 迫切需要就收集的最低疗效、治疗负担和安全性数据达成共识，以加强真实世界的证据基础。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
target: 抗血管内皮生长因子(anti-vascular endothelial growth factor,anti-VEGF)已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
target: 包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性(n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变(PDR)和视网膜静脉阻塞(RVO)。

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
target: 然而，这些药物是通过玻璃体内注射给药的，玻璃体内注射与威胁视力的并发症有关。

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
target: 在这些并发症中，最可怕的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼部感染，视力结果极差。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
target: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常要经过多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

source: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
target: 每次注射都有威胁视力的并发症的风险。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
target: 因此，人们对开发抗VEGF药物到眼后段的持续递送平台产生了极大的兴趣。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
target: 近年来，已经概念化了各种战略。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
target: 这些包括不可生物降解植入物、纳米制剂和水凝胶。

source: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.
target: 在这篇综述中，将解释药物递送到眼后段的障碍。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
target: 然后将讨论理想的持续给药平台的特点。

source: Finally, the current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.
target: 最后，将在考虑到上述特点的情况下对现有的策略进行分析，以确定每种持续给药方式的优缺点。

source: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.
target: 通过以上内容，本综述试图概述处于不同发展阶段的持续交付平台。

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw combined with multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy for chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis.
target: 评价骨水泥注射空心椎弓根螺钉联合多水平Schwab Ⅲ级截骨术治疗慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴后凸畸形的疗效。

source: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
target: 方法回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月期间收治的27例症状性慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并后凸畸形患者的临床资料。

source: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
target: 其中男性8例，女性19例，平均年龄69.5岁(范围56~81岁)。

source: The damage segment (kyphosis vertex) included T  No complications related to pedicle screw and bone cement occurred.
target: 损伤节段(脊柱后凸顶点)包括T无椎弓根螺钉及骨水泥相关并发症发生。

source: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
target: 26例切口均以原意愈合，1例因血糖控制不佳，经换药后切口愈合。

source: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
target: 无褥疮、坠积性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症发生。

source: All patients were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.
target: 所有患者均获随访8~24个月，平均16.6个月。

source: The VAS score, ODI score, Cobb angle, and SVA were significantly improved when compared with those before operation (  For the chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis, the cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw and multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy has the advantages of less operation trauma, quick recovery, and remarkable effectiveness.
target: VAS评分、ODI评分、Cobb角、SVA较术前明显改善(对于合并脊柱后凸的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折，采用骨水泥注射空心椎弓根螺钉和多水平Schwab Ⅲ级截骨术具有手术创伤小、恢复快、疗效显着的优点。

source: Although the influence of neighborhood disadvantage on youth development of delinquent behavior is well established, findings from this research have yet to inform the development of family-centered prevention programming to protect youth from these erosive effects. The current paper examines the role of family integration in buffering the impact of social disadvantage in a sample of N = 298 families randomly assigned either to a control condition or to a family-based prevention program previously shown to enhance marriage and parenting.
target: 尽管邻里劣势对青少年犯罪行为发展的影响已得到很好的证实，但这项研究的结果尚未为制定以家庭为中心的预防方案提供依据，以保护青少年免受这些侵蚀影响。本论文在一个样本中考察了家庭融合在缓冲社会劣势影响方面的作用，样本为N = 298个家庭，随机分配到控制条件或基于家庭的预防方案中，该方案以前被证明可以促进婚姻和养育子女。

source: We first confirmed that neighborhood concentrated disadvantage predicted change in delinquent behaviors across the course of the study.
target: 我们首次证实，在整个研究过程中，邻里集中劣势预测了犯罪行为的变化。

source: Additionally, replicating prior work, parents participating in the Protecting Strong African American Families (ProSAAF) program, relative to those randomly assigned to the control group, significantly improved their use of effective communication strategies with each other and reduced ineffective conflict in front of youth.
target: 此外，复制以前的工作，参与保护强大非裔美国人家庭(ProSAAF)计划的父母，相对于那些随机分配到对照组的父母，显着改善了他们彼此有效沟通策略的使用，并减少了在年轻人面前的无效冲突。

source: This resulted in a significant indirect effect of ProSAAF on change in youth delinquent behaviors.
target: 这导致了ProSAAF对青少年犯罪行为改变的显着间接影响。

source: Furthermore, using mediated moderation analysis, the study tested the buffering effect of greater family integration, showing that experimentally produced change in interparental communication skills and the resulting reduction in youth exposure to parental conflict buffered the effect of neighborhood disadvantage on change in youth delinquent behaviors, supporting a mediated moderation model in which family environments buffer neighborhood effects.
target: 此外，使用介导的适度分析，该研究测试了更大的家庭融合的缓冲效应，表明实验产生的父母间沟通技能的变化以及由此产生的青年暴露于父母冲突的减少缓冲了邻里劣势对青年犯罪行为变化的影响，支持了家庭环境缓冲邻里效应的介导的适度模型。

target_errors.term: 更大的家庭融合的缓冲效应

source: To summarize the research progress of the effects of high glucose microenvironment on the biological activity of adipose-derived stem cells (ADSCs).
target: 总结高糖微环境对脂肪干细胞(adipose-derived stem cells,ADSCs)生物活性影响的研究进展。

source: The literature on the high glucose microenvironment and ADSCs at home and abroad in recent years was reviewed, and the effects of high glucose microenvironment on the general characteristics, differentiation potential, angiogenesis, and nerve regeneration of ADSCs were summarized.
target: 综述了近年来国内外有关高糖微环境与ADSCs的文献，总结了高糖微环境对ADSCs的一般特性、分化潜能、血管生成、神经再生的影响。

source: The accumulation of advanced glycosylation end products (AGEs) in the high glucose microenvironment led to changes in the biological activities of ADSCs through various pathways, including cell surface markers, proliferation, migration, multi-lineage differentiation, secretory function, and tissue repair ability.
target: 高级糖基化终产物(AGEs)在高糖微环境中的蓄积通过多种途径导致ADSCs生物活性的变化，包括细胞表面标记物、增殖、迁移、多系分化、分泌功能和组织修复能力。

source: The ability of ADSCs to promote angiogenesis and nerve regeneration in high glucose microenvironment is still controversial.
target: ADSCs在高糖微环境中促进血管生成和神经再生的能力仍存在争议。

source: High glucose microenvironment can affect the biological activity of ADSCs, and the effect and mechanism of ADSCs on angiogenesis and nerve regeneration in high glucose microenvironment need to be further studied.
target: 高糖微环境可影响ADSCs的生物活性，高糖微环境中ADSCs对血管生成和神经再生的作用及机制有待进一步研究。

source: Emergent medical rescue for major disaster accidents and severe war trauma are the state demand.
target: 重大灾害事故和严重战争创伤的紧急医疗救援是国家的要求。

source: The fast and effective emergent medical rescue depends on the establishment of integrated emergent medical rescue system.
target: 快速有效的紧急医学救援有赖于一体化的紧急医学救援体系的建立。

source: We discuss the importance and necessity of establishment of integrated emergent medical rescue system with Chinese characteristics and its main contents in very important regional strategy of China.
target: 讨论了建立具有中国特色的一体化紧急医学救援体系的重要性和必要性及其在我国非常重要的区域战略中的主要内容。

source: Complex kinship analysis refers to a kind of special kinship analysis taken for the purpose of personal identification or other issues in civil or criminal cases because the father or （and） mother is dead, or cannot participate in the analysis for other reasons.
target: 复杂血缘关系分析是指在民事或刑事案件中，由于父亲或(和)母亲死亡，或由于其他原因不能参与分析，为了个人身份或其他问题而采取的一种特殊血缘关系分析。

source: Due to the absence of significant appraised persons in this kind of kinship analysis, grandparents, siblings or collateral relatives are required to participate in the analysis.
target: 由于在这种亲缘关系分析中没有重要的被评估者，因此需要祖父母、兄弟姐妹或旁系亲属参与分析。

source: Complex kinship analysis is widely used and the demand is increasing year by year.
target: 复杂亲缘关系分析应用广泛，需求逐年增加。

source: This paper analyzes the main types of complex kinships, the genetic markers of complex kinship analysis and their advantages and disadvantages and the calculation methods for complex kinship analysis by referring to the relevant literatures at home and abroad in recent years.
target: 本文通过参考近年来国内外相关文献，对复杂亲缘关系的主要类型、复杂亲缘关系分析的遗传标记及其优缺点、复杂亲缘关系分析的计算方法进行了分析。

source: At the same time, the shortcomings of the present research on complex kinship and its future development are prospected.
target: 同时，对目前复杂亲缘关系研究存在的不足及未来的发展进行了展望。

source: This article analyzes the clinical manifestations and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) data of 2 patients with hypoxic encephalopathy after simple asphyxia gas poisoning.
target: 本文分析了2例单纯窒息性煤气中毒后缺氧性脑病患者的临床表现和磁共振成像(MRI)资料。

source: Both patients were in a moderate coma after being poisoned, and the arterial blood lactic acid level and carbon dioxide partial pressure were higher than the normal range within 1 week after poisoning.
target: 2例患者中毒后均处于中度昏迷状态，中毒后1周内动脉血乳酸水平和二氧化碳分压均高于正常范围。

source: Two patients were cured and discharged after being treated with oxygen therapy and glucocorticoids.
target: 2例患者经氧疗和糖皮质激素治疗后治愈出院。

source: The prognosis was good.
target: 预后良好。

source: Chronic hepatitis B virus (HBV) infection remains a major world public health problem.
target: 慢性乙型肝炎病毒(HBV)感染仍然是主要的世界公共卫生问题。

source: Current guidelines of chronic hepatitis B (CHB) suggest the clinical cure as the ideal thearapeutic goal.
target: 目前慢性乙型肝炎(CHB)的治疗指南建议将临床治愈作为理想的治疗目标。

source: Although the optimization of the existing antiviral treatment can make some patients achieve clinical cure, but for most patients with chronic hepatitis B, it is difficult to achieve clinical cure according to the existing antiviral treatment plan.
target: 虽然优化现有的抗病毒治疗方案可以使部分患者达到临床治愈，但对于大多数慢性乙肝患者来说，按照现有的抗病毒治疗方案很难达到临床治愈。

source: The medical community has begun to work together to seek new treatment strategies, especially the immune intervention measures aimed at restoring the immune response in the liver microenvironment.
target: 医学界已开始共同努力寻求新的治疗策略，特别是旨在恢复肝脏微环境中的免疫应答的免疫干预措施。
